attributes.action: Stop the closure of the university hospital of hartlepool
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The hospital in hartlepool is to close and all services be moved to stockton. Petition to stop this happening.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the closure of the university hospital of hartlepool."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13089.asp

Prime Minister's Office
